product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Leisure Chair - Special Buy
long_description: Lightweight and collabsible for easy carrying, the ALPS Mountaineering Leisure Chair brings the comfort of your living room to the campsite. Honeycomb polyester seat and powder-coated steel frame make this chair as durable as it is comfortable. Compact, foldable design lets you store it almost anywhere. Side pouch keeps a beverage or other small necessities handy. The ALPS Mountaineering Leisure Chair includes a shoulder carry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Lightweight and collabsible for easy carrying, the ALPS Mountaineering Leisure Chair brings the comfort of your living room to the campsite.
